name: DarkSearch Material - Google
description: The latest dark google theme and possibly the most refined around! with an emphasis on material design and attention to detail, as well as being updated on 2017, makes this the best experience for those looking for a darker, more pleasant on the eyes browsing experience.
additional_info:
Theme created from scratch since I wanted something better than what was going around.

Any feedback regarding this and ideas for making it easier to read / more confortable / more pretty are all welcome!

- This theme provides support for the google main page, google search (news videos web etc) and google images, more support could be added if requested.

Changelog:

15/06/17 :
- FIx for google answers to questions
- Fix for "People also ask"
- Minor fixes
- Advanced Search

05/12/16 :
- Fixed white border on top of search page
- Fixed white borders on movie card
- fixed twitter cards being white

16/04/16 :
- Minor fixes
- Fix for black text on political campaigns side bar

23/03/16 :
- Fixed showtimes for movies and the topics on the info box appearing black
- Fixed google.com/ not being styled
